name: VLDC 11
description:
3 Years after VLDC11, and over 1 year after this project started, it's finally here!
This is the compilation of SMWCentral's 11th Vanilla Level Design Contest. Featuring 111 entries + one unranked level, and 4 switch palaces, totaling in at 116 exits.
Huge thanks goes to AnEvilGhost, who originally started the project and inserted all the levels, and to everyone else who helped with the compilation.

Outside of the levels, here are some things that were made and used for this hack:
- A big new overworld, including submaps, created by yours truly.
- New overworld expansion patch, overworld indicators, and the best world coded by MarioFanGamer.
- Best world level graphics drawn by Ruberjig.
- Overworld warp asm by Kevin, similar to the warp pipe in VLDC9.
- Custom overworld sprites by carol, updated by Ice Man to work with Asar and SA-1.
- SMB3 boat by Tsutarja.
- VLDC9 overworld sprites by Lui.
- Extended Overworld Level Names by Alcaro and Smallhacker.
- Autosave by Alcaro, Erik, and westslasher2

  • Overworld soundtrack composed by
    bebn legg, Blind Devil, brickblock369, Dispace, Maxodex, Teows, Ultima,

I hope you enjoy the compilation!
